answer: 'You shall have no other gods before Me'
'You shall not take the name of the Lord your God in vain...'
'Remember the Sabbath day, to keep it holy'
'Honor your father and your mother, and You shall love your neighbor as yourself'
'You shall not murder'
'You shall not commit adultery'
'You shall not steal'
'You shall not bear false witness against your neighbor'
'You shall not covet... anything that is your neighbor's'
'Little children, keep yourselves from idols'
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want
Depart from evil, and do good; seek peace, and pursue it
Judge not, that you be not judged
'A good tree cannot bear bad fruit, nor can a bad tree bear good fruit.'
'Not what goes into the mouth defiles a man; but what comes out of the mouth that defiles a man'
Be not deceived: evil communications corrupt good manners
For we walk by faith, not by sight
You reap what you sow
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me
Set your affection on things above, not on things on the earth
Abstain from all appearance of evil
God bless you
hint: When you wish someone well or when someone sneezes

answer: God is good, all the time. And all the time, God is good
Jesus take the wheel

answer: Let go, let God

answer: Practice makes perfect
Don't be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try
Leave your comfort zone, there is no growth there
If you get tired, learn to rest, not quit
Don't be eye candy, be soul food

hint: stop complaining and appreciate the good things

answer: Supporting one's success won't ever dampen yours
hint: always wish your neighbors well, don't hate

answer: Don't trust everything you see. Even salt looks like sugar
Make peace with your past so it does not affect the present
What others think of you is none of your business

hint: your mood is up to you

answer: Failure is not the opposite of success. It is part of success

answer: Be a warrior, not a worrier
